Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGRAVED; ENGOBE
Name: Lamp
Description: Bitruncate-cone shaped lamp, circular in outline, with wide fuelling mouth and fragmented whorl handle at the rear. Reddish-coloured paste and surface covered with a coating of the same colour. The top edge presents an incised decoration on the basis of lines and there are two other parallel lines on the curvature in the middle. The light orifice bears signs of use.
